#: Add CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md (Contributor Covenant)

Description
-----------
Add a `CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md` using the Contributor Covenant template and link to it from `CONTRIBUTING.md` and `README.md`.

Acceptance criteria
-------------------
- `CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md` exists and references a contact email or reporting mechanism.
- README and CONTRIBUTING link to the Code of Conduct.

Labels: `good first issue`, `docs`
